description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of art thefts have left the local galleries in disarray. As whispers of betrayal echo through the cobblestone streets, you must navigate a web of deceit to uncover the true mastermind behind the chaos. Each suspect presents a façade, but only one holds the key to the truth. Can you decipher the clues hidden in their stories and catch the elusive thief before they vanish into the night?
